title: Oxford 3000-5000
description: Core vocabulary for English learners - A1 to B2 levels

words.definition: Used before a noun to refer to one thing
From one side to the other
A thing that a person does
A person who acts in plays or films
To put something with something else
The length of time someone has lived
Place where planes take off and land
Used to connect words or phrases
words.example: I have a cat ---- a dog.

words.definition: A living creature that is not a plant
One or some, no matter which
A set of rooms in a building
A round fruit with red or green skin
The fourth month of the year
A particular part of a place
The part of body from shoulder to hand
A piece of writing in a newspaper
Used to show location or time
The eighth month of the year
The season between summer and winter
A container made of flexible material
A round object used in games

words.example: I need to go to the ----.

words.definition: Washing in water in a tub
A room with a toilet and bath
A piece of furniture for sleeping
An alcoholic drink made from grain
In the space separating two things
A feathered animal that can fly
A vehicle that travels on water
The physical structure of a person
Written or printed pages bound together
A type of shoe covering the ankle
The two; one and the other
The first meal of the day
To carry something to a place
words.example: Can you ---- me a glass of water?

words.definition: A color like chocolate or coffee
A structure with walls and a roof
A soft yellow food made from milk
To get something by paying money
words.example: I want to ---- a new phone.

words.definition: A small restaurant selling drinks and snacks
The main city of a country
A motor vehicle with four wheels
A piece of stiff paper; a payment card

words.example: Can you ---- this bag for me?

words.definition: To capture; to get on a bus/train
A thin round disc for music/data

words.example: The shop is in the city ----.

words.definition: A piece of furniture for sitting
Small coins; the act of changing
A bird kept for eggs or meat
A group of students; a lesson
A room where classes are held
To shut; to make not open
White or grey mass in the sky
words.example: There's a big ---- in the sky.

words.definition: To make the same as original
To divide with a sharp object

words.example: I write in my ---- every night.
Use a ---- to find the meaning.
